properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 8:02PM MST until February 16 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations
of 5 to 10 inches in the mountains, 2 to 4 inches on mountain
passes and in West Yellowstone, and 1 to 2 inches in the
valleys. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph in the mountains.

* WHERE...Gallatin, Madison and Beaverhead.

* WHEN...Until 8 PM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Plan on slippery or
snow covered roads. Falling and blowing snow could significantly
reduce visibility, especially over mountain passes and in the
mountains.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavier snow showers, especially during
Sunday afternoon, could cause brief periods of near whiteout
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET
